DOC.brief_summary: This study is conducted in Japan. The aim of the study is to evaluate the efficacy of somatropin (NorditropinÂ®) on adult height (cm) in patients with achondroplasia / hypochondroplasia enrolled in the GH-1941 study (NCT01516229).
DOC.brief_title: A Survey Collecting Data on Adult Height in Patients With Achondroplasia Treated With Somatropin
DOC.criteria: Patients who were enrolled in the GH1941 study (1997 to 2006) and expected to theoretically reach the adult height within the study period
